text: Rafael Santos de Sousa (born 2 February 1998), commonly known as Rafael Santos, is a Brazilian professional footballer who currently plays as a centre back for APOEL, on loan from Flamengo. ==Career== ===Flamengo=== ====APOEL (loan)==== On 29 May 2020 APOEL signed Santos from Flamengo on loan until May 2022.
